mapper.update: UPDATE LEDGER SET MONEY=MONEY+#{sortamount}+#{pastamount} WHERE TO_NUMBER(ID)>TO_NUMBER(#{id})
UPDATE LEDGER SET SORT=#{sort}, CONTENT=#{content}, AMOUNT=#{amount}, MONEY=MONEY+#{sortamount}+#{pastamount}, ETC=#{etc} WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT L.*, S.NAME FROM LEDGER L, SMEMBER S WHERE L.EMPNO=S.EMPNO AND ID=#{query} ORDER BY REGDATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, L.*, S.NAME FROM LEDGER L, SMEMBER S WHERE L.EMPNO=S.EMPNO ${query} ORDER BY ID DESC)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LEDGER (ID, EMPNO, REGDATE, ENABLE, SORT, CONTENT, AMOUNT, MONEY, ETC) VALUES(TO_CHAR(LEDGERSEQ.NEXTVAL), #{empno}, SYSDATE, #{enable}, #{sort}, #{content}, #{amount}, (SELECT MONEY FROM LEDGER WHERE ID = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(ID)) FROM LEDGER))+#{sortamount}, #{etc})
mapper.select: SELECT NAME, AUTH, TEAM FROM SMEMBER WHERE EMPNO=#{query}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, L.*, S.NAME FROM LEDGER L, SMEMBER S WHERE L.EMPNO=S.EMPNO ${query} ORDER BY REGDATE DESC) WHERE R>=#{start} AND R<=#{end}
